function dba:db-rename( $name as xs:string, $resource as xs:string, $target as xs:string?, $error as xs:string? ) as element(html) { html:wrap(map { 'header': ($dba:CAT, $name), 'error': $error },

{ html:link('Databases', $dba:CAT), ' » ', html:link($name, $dba:SUB, map { 'name': $name }), ' » ', html:link($resource, $dba:SUB, map { 'name': $name, 'resource': $resource }), ' » ', html:button('db-rename', 'Rename') }

) }
